title: La Pause Quinoa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast food restaurant that offers gluten-free quinoa specialties, dairy-free desserts and vegan meals like salads, soups and quinoa meals served in a box. There are two vegan inboxes: Indian (quinoa, lentil dhal and vegetables) and couscous with vegetables which are cooked separately from meat. Vegan cakes are available. Dine-in or take-out.
